p: Data were presented as mean ± S.E.M. of four observations for the in vitro studies and mean ± S.D. of seven observations for the in vivo studies, respectively. Statistical analysis was done using a two-way analysis of variance followed by the Student-Newman-Keuls test on GraphPad Prism Version 5. Statistical significance was considered at p < 0.05, p < 0.001, and p < 0.0001.
